title: Turtle & Tortoise Quiz
description: Shell out your best answers in this quiz about turtles, tortoises, and terrapins

questions.question: What is the main difference between a turtle and a tortoise?
options: Turtles live in water, tortoises live on land

questions.question: Which giant tortoise species from the Galapagos Islands can live for over 150 years?
Which is the largest sea turtle species, reaching up to 7 feet in length and 2,000 pounds?
Which sea turtle gets its name from the color of its body fat, caused by its diet of seagrass and algae?
Which freshwater turtle from North America is known for its powerful bite and its spiked, dinosaur-like appearance?
What unique feature does the alligator snapping turtle use to lure fish into its mouth?
options: A worm-shaped appendage on its tongue

questions.question: Which popular pet tortoise from Africa is the third-largest tortoise species and is also called the African spurred tortoise?
How do sea turtles find their way back to the same beach where they were born to lay their eggs?
Which small, colorful turtle is the most popular pet turtle in the United States?
What is a turtle's shell made of?
Which endangered sea turtle has a beautiful shell pattern that was historically used to make jewelry and combs?
Which North American turtle can completely close its shell like a box, protecting itself entirely inside?
What determines the sex of most turtle and tortoise hatchlings?
Which tortoise from Madagascar has a stunning star pattern on each section of its shell?
Which freshwater turtle has a distinctive long neck that it tucks sideways under its shell rather than pulling it straight back?
